data.subtitle: 2021 - 2023: Company solution consultant
text: Application specialist at the Hospital in Padua, plus participations in kick-offs of our software in various italian hospitals.

I have been a point person for the customer, with a role of responsibility and autonomy both in the management of routine activities (customer assistance, training, data extraction) and in the improvement of the proposed solution (configurations of new features, database maintenance).

I gained extensive experience on-the-job of Oracle SQL and healthcare IT consultancy, while improving various soft skills: relational skills with colleagues and customers, efficient work organization, problem solving, emergency management.

text: ▶ entertainer, organizer and coordinator of the parish summer camp

I believe I fit the engineer stereotypes quite well, being a bit of a "nerd" and all. My main hobby is playing a lot of games, such as board games, card games, and especially video games; in fact, I'd like to develop a game of my own someday. Additionally, I have a keen interest in watching anime, TV series, and films.

Ever since high school, and to this day, I have actively engaged in volunteering, particularly with children and teenagers. I really enjoy spending spending time with them, and I genuinely believe that everyone should give it a try.
If given the opportunity, I hope to utilize my programming skills to assist and make a positive impact on people's lives.
